divs: Sighting DetailsI Woke up and leaning on my elbo and beside me was a circular disk I tried to adjust my eyes to see it better and then I Think it Realized I was Now awake something now was in my Body Spiritlike. As it Left it Told Me Telepathhically "Am Leaving Now" And All This Time I Had A Feeling Of Euphoric.Your Truly Ray Byron
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Montreal
There was one other sighting in Montreal on or around March 15th 2013
